report.sql: select a.factorvalue 工资, b.name 姓名, c.name 主部门, b.stationkind 岗位归类, f.viewname 工资类型, e.monthly 月度 from (select userid, salarybillid, factorid, sum(factorvalue) factorvalue from sal_salarybill_detail group by userid,salarybillid,factorid) a left join v_sal_personinfo b on a.userid = b.id left join pub_corp_dept c on b.maindeptid=c.id left join sal_salarybill e on e.id=a.salarybillid left join sal_account_factor f on a.factorid=f.factorid where b.name is not null and e.sal_account_setid in (select id from sal_account_set where name in('月工资账套')) and f.accountid in(select id from sal_account_set where name in('月工资账套')) and e.monthly>=?month_start? and e.monthly<=?month_end? and f.factorid ='1288' order by b.code, e.monthly
